decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (1220.11, received 31.01.2014, 1220.12a, received 15.04.2014, 1220.13P, received 30.04.2014, 1220.14P and 1220.15P, received 10.02.2014, 1220.16Pb, received 30.04.2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the approved extension without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a two-storey side infill extension, a first floor rear extension, the insertion of 1 x side bedroom window at first floor level and 2 x roof lights to the front elevation and 2 x roof lights to the rear elevation.
